titleStmt.title: An essay toward settlement upon a sure foundation being an humble testimony for God in this perillous time, by a few, who have been bewailing their own, and other abominations, and would not be comforted, until their Redeemer, who is holy, be exalted in righteousnesse, and his name which hath been so much blasphemed, be sanctified in the sight of the nations.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
